acceptlink.name: AcceptLink
acceptlink.description: Grants permission to accept a link invitation from another Gateway

createinboundexternallink.name: CreateInboundExternalLink
createinboundexternallink.description: Grants permission to create an inbound external link for a responder gateway

createlink.name: CreateLink
createlink.description: Grants permission to create a new link between RTB applications

createoutboundexternallink.name: CreateOutboundExternalLink
createoutboundexternallink.description: Grants permission to create an outbound external link for a requester gateway to connect to external public responder endpoints

createrequestergateway.name: CreateRequesterGateway
createrequestergateway.description: Grants permission to create a requester gateway

createrespondergateway.name: CreateResponderGateway
createrespondergateway.description: Grants permission to create a responder gateway

deleteinboundexternallink.name: DeleteInboundExternalLink
deleteinboundexternallink.description: Grants permission to delete an inbound external link

deletelink.name: DeleteLink
deletelink.description: Grants permission to delete a link between RTB applications

deleteoutboundexternallink.name: DeleteOutboundExternalLink
deleteoutboundexternallink.description: Grants permission to delete an outbound external link

deleterequestergateway.name: DeleteRequesterGateway
deleterequestergateway.description: Grants permission to delete a requester gateway

deleterespondergateway.name: DeleteResponderGateway
deleterespondergateway.description: Grants permission to delete a responder gateway

getinboundexternallink.name: GetInboundExternalLink
getinboundexternallink.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an inbound external link

getlink.name: GetLink
getlink.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a link between RTB applications

getoutboundexternallink.name: GetOutboundExternalLink
getoutboundexternallink.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an outbound external link

getrequestergateway.name: GetRequesterGateway
getrequestergateway.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a requester gateway

getrespondergateway.name: GetResponderGateway
getrespondergateway.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about a responder gateway

listlinks.name: ListLinks
listlinks.description: Grants permission to list links associated with an RTB application

listrequestergateways.name: ListRequesterGateways
listrequestergateways.description: Grants permission to list requester gateways with optional filtering and pagination

listrespondergateways.name: ListResponderGateways
listrespondergateways.description: Grants permission to list responder gateways with optional filtering and pagination

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

rejectlink.name: RejectLink
rejectlink.description: Grants permission to reject a link request between RTB applications

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to assign one or more tags (key-value pairs) to the specified resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove a tag or tags from a resource

updatelink.name: UpdateLink
updatelink.description: Grants permission to update configuration settings for an existing link

updatelinkmoduleflow.name: UpdateLinkModuleFlow
updatelinkmoduleflow.description: Grants permission to update a link module flow

updaterequestergateway.name: UpdateRequesterGateway
updaterequestergateway.description: Grants permission to update a requester gateway

updaterespondergateway.name: UpdateResponderGateway
updaterespondergateway.description: Grants permission to update a responder gateway
